title: Repack Associate
description: Received, stocked, and organized merchandise using RF scanners for inventory tracking.
Operated pump trucks and secured shipments for safe transport.
Trained new employees on warehouse procedures and inventory systems.
Resolved device sync issues and flagged barcode mismatches to maintain order accuracy.
Utilized digital tools and RF scanner technology to improve inventory accuracy.

title: Retail Sales Associate
description: Provided product information and personalized recommendations to customers.
Supported order fulfillment including curbside, in-store, and online orders.
Resolved digital issues for customers and escalated technical problems.
Maintained organized displays and stocked inventory.
Assisted customers with mobile POS and handheld scanner devices during transactions.

title: Sales Associate
description: Delivered exceptional customer service and promoted loyalty programs.
Assisted with inventory management and restocking.
Supported customers with mobile app usage and basic troubleshooting.
Processed transactions and maintained store organization.
Helped customers navigate mobile loyalty apps and troubleshoot basic digital issues.
